name: Webpage clean text extractor
description: Fetches the clean, readable text from any webpage using the Jina AI Reader service and saves it to a local file.
author: @@official.shinkai

show_content.description: Whether to include the fetched text content in the result. Use 'true' to let the AI see the content. Use 'false' to simply create a .txt file.

url.description: The URL to fetch. If missing a scheme, https:// is prepended.

timeout_seconds.description: HTTP request timeout in seconds. Default: 30.
